description:
This application allows you to keep track of your menstrual cycles and to automatically predict menstruation periods and probable ovulation days. You can attach a note containing information about your mood, taken medications or other information to each day. You can keep a diary this way. Information for women who want to get pregnant: the closer the intercourse to ovulation time, the higher are the chances to have a boy.

If you have any questions, do not hesitate to email the developers - we will answer you as soon as possible.

Features:
* Keeps full history of your menstrual cycles.
* Notes may be attached to each day in the calendar - it may be used as a simple diary.
* Allows to track up to four different symptoms (e.g. migraine and abdominal pain).
* Allows to track body temperature (Fahrenheit, Celsius). Displays basal body temperature charts.
* Automatically predicts menstruation periods.
* Automatically predicts probable ovulation days.
* Automatically calculates average period length.
* The user interface is easy to use and looks good.

Why should you choose our application?
* You can track body temperature and up to four symptoms.
* You can attach any notes to the days in the calendar.
* The user interface was designed by a woman.
* We constantly add new features.
* We listen to users.
